name: Way Home VR
description:
Way Home (Nyanyan Symulator) is a cardboard VR game made in 30h during Hackerspace Summer Game Jam. It's about...  rainbow puking :) 

What it's about:
Just relax admiring stars in your way home and look at your parents when they call you. And if you realize that you are not feeling well - aim into the bucket.

Oh. And be careful. Tacnayn starts chasing you when your rainbow appears :)

Dad looking - car slow down

Mom Looking - you're getting sick faster

Credits

  • Michał IXI Kobzdaj
  • Moldiar
  • Szymon Dudzik - WhiteWolfIron
